values.bot: For oauth2 bots, this puts the bot in the user's selected guild by default
values.connections: Allows /users/@me/connections to return linked Twitch and YouTube accounts
values.guilds: Allows /users/@me/guilds to return basic information about all of a user's guilds
values.guilds.join: Allows /invites/{invite.id} to be used for joining a user's guild
values.gdm.join: Allows your app to join users to a group dm
values.messages.read: For local rpc server api access, this allows you to read messages from all client channels (otherwise restricted to channels/guilds your app creates)
values.rpc: For local rpc server access, this allows you to control a user's local Discord client
values.rpc.api: For local rpc server api access, this allows you to access the API as the local user
values.rpc.notifications.read: For local rpc server api access, this allows you to receive notifications pushed out to the user
values.webhook.incoming: This generates a webhook that is returned in the oauth token response for authorization code grants
